```{r echo=FALSE}
external_link <- function(link, title) {
  htmltools::tagList(
    title,
    htmltools::tags$a(
      href = link,
      fontawesome::fa("external-link-square-alt", title = title, a11y = "sem")
    )
  )
}
```
